title: Citi Wins Top Honors in the Global Euromoney Awards for Excellence
tag-1: Citi Wins Top Honors in the Global Euromoney Awards for Excellence
tag-2: New York, NY — Citi was recognized with a series of global, regional and country awards by Euromoney, the preeminent global financial markets magazine, at its annual Awards for Excellence dinner in London, held on July 12, 2023.
tag-4: “We are honored to receive this recognition from Euromoney which is the result of Citi successfully delivering on our strategic priorities,” said Paco Ybarra, Chief Executive Officer of Citi’s Institutional Clients Group, “We continue to invest in our industry-leading Services business to enhance the client experience and expand the integrated solutions we offer,” he added. “These awards recognize our dedication to innovation, unmatched global platform and continued intense focus on clients.”
tag-5: Citi’s Services businesses include Treasury and Trade Solutions and Securities Services. In 2022, both businesses grew revenues and market share, through increased use of the global network across a range of products by both new and existing clients.
tag-6: Citi also received multiple regional and country awards including:
tag-7: Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS) provides integrated cash management, working capital and trade finance solutions to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations around the globe.
tag-8: Securities Services provides cross-border support for clients with extensive on-the-ground local market expertise, innovative post-trade technologies, customized data solutions and a wide range of securities services solutions that can be tailored to meet clients’ needs. Clients include asset managers, insurance companies, institutional investors, banks and broker dealers, and market infrastructures.
tag-9: Citi’s Banking, Capital Markets and Advisory franchise provides comprehensive relationship coverage and a full suite of products and services in an effort to be the best possible financial partner for institutional clients.
tag-10: The Euromoney Awards for Excellence are in their 28th year and are recognized to be among the most prestigious in the financial services industry.
tag-12: Citi is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in nearly 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
tag-13: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi
tag-15: For almost 50 years, Euromoney has been the leading publication for covering the growth of international finance. Over the past 12 months its coverage has included interviews with close to 100 bank CEOs, ministers of finance and central bank governors around the world.
tag-16: Euromoney's Awards for Excellence are the awards that matter to the banks and bankers who matter. They were established in 1992 and were the first of their kind in the global banking industry. This year Euromoney received almost 1,500 submissions from banks in an awards programme that covers 20 global awards, more than 50 regional awards, and best bank awards in close to 100 countries.
